posts.content:
Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Leadership is about uncomfortable conversations and decisions. 

Great leadership is doing both without delay.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Large language models grow by relentlessly ingesting diverse data. True for our mind too. It’s best to keep sampling new disciplines and trends to keep evolving our mental algorithms. 

When success makes curiosity shrink, our personal “LLM” stops learning and starts coasting.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah wealth thrives when you give it attention.

we launched CRED money in 2024 to enable affluent members to do exactly that: pay closer attention to their wealth with tools to track, categorize, and manage it. 

and here's the result:
•⁠ ⁠members now invest 6-14% more
•⁠ ⁠members with bounce charges have dropped by 32%
•⁠ ⁠40% have seen improvements in their credit score

money, like all luxury goods, is high maintenance.
good thing CRED members have help.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah It’s hard to be wealthy if you’re not surrounded by people who value their time a lot.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Envy of someone’s genetic or inherited gifts is futile as it’s just luck. Envy of someone’s earned success is misdirected as it’s a signal of lessons you’ve yet to learn.

Envy reveals what you desire, but not the path to get there.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Leadership calibre is the proportion of top-performing teammates willing to follow a leader to the next venture even at a lower salary.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah hashtag
#mondaymotivation

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Being long term is often hard for the inexperienced.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Narcissists often admire each other at first and are drawn to shared confidence and ambition but the bond breaks when neither is willing to play the admirer. 

In the end, there can only be one star

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Mid life crisis. Reimagined.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Mid life crisis. Reimagined.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Introverts who hate managing people may be first to automate most things with AI.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah AI made me realize a clear sign of intelligence is someone’s ability to quickly grasp something complex without providing a ton of context.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah AI may force freshers to become entrepreneurs due to lack of entry level jobs.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah If a knowledgeable person doesn’t use their knowledge to build, they may end up using their knowledge to judge and become a cynic.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Those who work in large IT or ITES companies, what impact do you see of AI in your company? 

(Serious replies only)

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Thick skin comes from scars. 

Thick skin is scars.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah CRED Rabbit Hole has officially concluded.
Congratulations Amith for pushing the limits of what AI can do. 

Huge thanks to our jury Dilip Asbe Paras Chopra Soham Ganatra (Hiring) and Tejeshwi Sharma , and our partners Amazon Web Services (AWS) AWS for Financial Services and Yotta Data Services Private Limited 

Until next time. CRED
CRED on April 4th, 71 minds gathered to create breakthrough AI solutions.
2 days later, one of them walked away with ₹50 lakh.

Amith KK created an AI-powered solution that automates compliance, going from idea to working demo in 48 hours. congratulations on the win, Amith K K

with this, CRED Rabbit Hole 2025 has officially concluded.
the future it shaped is now in motion.

Yotta Data Services Private Limited Amazon Web Services (AWS) AWS for Financial Services

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah I see youth becoming heavily dependent on AI even for silliest decisions. 

If people outsource their thinking to AI, their brain may atrophy. Just like any other muscle which isn’t used.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Most experts will remain in denial about AI, while most generalists will leverage it to bridge gaps in their expertise.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah Short term actions earn affection; long term actions earn respect.

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah AI won’t replace you. Someone from this hackathon might.

Apply by March 24th: cred.club/rabbit-hole 

Winner gets ₹50 lakh and a place in history. Rabbit Hole 2025 cred.club

Kunal Shah
Kunal Shah AI/GPTs are replacing all paid expert chats as it’s free, fast and mostly reliable. 

What a crazy time to be alive where you can chat live with all of humanity’s wisdom for free.
